author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: Spain sees fall in confirmed new deaths
description: Prime minister says country is starting to see ‘light at the end of the tunnel’
content:
The coronavirus pandemic has infected more than one million people worldwide and over 63,000 deaths have been recorded.
Spain recorded 6,023 confirmed new infections on Sunday, taking the national tally to 130,759. That is down from an increase of 7,026 infe… [+3744 chars]
